item.description:
It's at a ski resort... http://www.woodburyskiarea.com/summer/concerts.html
This is their 40th year.
Camping on the side of the ski slope, arts and crafts, tubing, cookouts, drinking, live reggae bands and dancing from 11am to 1 or 2am
Cost is $55 for early bird general admission
$25 tubing
$15 camping
$10 parking

 

$70 for Providence Collective members for all of the above package or you can spend the day for the $55 admission, plus parking.

 

Woodbury Ski Area

785 Washington Road

1(203)263-2203

ASK FOR LENO and tell him you're a P-Collective member to get the $70 package.
item.how_to_find_us: Virak is hosting this one, please look at his picture!
item.name: Reggae Fest - Roots, Rock & Reggae 40th Anniversary - Woodbury, CT!
